#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
#define s(x) scanf("%lld", &x)
int main()
{
    map<long long int,long long int> a;
    long long int t,i,l,r;
    s(t);
    while(t--) {
        long long int n,q,ans;
        s(n);
        s(q);
        s(a[1]);
        for(i=2;i<=n;i++) {
            s(a[i]);
            a[i] = a[i] + a[i-1];
        }

        


        while(q--) {
            s(l);
            s(r);
            ans = a[r] - a[l-1];
            printf("%lld\n", ans);
        }


    }

    return 0;
}
